full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: All-Terrain Vehicle Trailers

#### Background
The Canadian Coast Guard is seeking a contract for the supply and delivery of All-Terrain Vehicle Trailers (ATV Tub Trailers) to support the Marine Environmental & Hazards Response (MEHR) service.

#### Contract Details
* Tender Reference Number: WS4447385962
* Solicitation Number: WS4447385962
* Publication Date: 20 June 2024
* Tender Closing Date: 15 July 2024, 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: 31 March 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

#### Tender Description
The Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement to establish a contract for the supply and delivery of ATV Tub Trailers to support the MEHR service.

This requirement is subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements, specifically the Inuvialuit Final Agreement, the Nunavut Land Claims Agreement, the Labrador Inuit Land Claims Agreement, and the Nunavik Inuit Land Claims Agreement.

#### Pre-Qualification and Requirements
Bidders must be pre-qualified suppliers of All-Terrain Vehicle Trailers. Suppliers must have a proven track record of providing similar products to the federal government and meet the requirements outlined in the tender package.

#### Contracting Entity and End-User Entity
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End-User Entity: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Selection Criteria
The lowest price will be used as the selection criteria.

#### Contact Information
* Point of Contact: Dustin Levere, PSPC
* Email: [dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Debriefing
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results.

#### Reference Documents
The complete tender package can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery website at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com
